Frequently Asked Questions About Pinterest Management Services

What is Pinterest?

Pinterest is a visual discovery engine that is used for sharing and discovering new interests. It works by posting(pinning) images or videos on board.

What Are The Benefits of Pinterest Management?

Pinterest drives organic traffic to a website and helps increase the overall awareness of a brand.

How Often I will Get Report?

Reporting by Rankon Technologies solely depends on the chosen Pinterest Marketing package. You can probably count on it happening every month or every week.

What Package Should I Choose?

Pinterest Marketing package should be chosen as per your business goals and objectives. We have categorized our Pinterest Marketing packages in such a way that it benefits all types of businesses be it small, medium or large—scale.

Does it Really Work?

Pinterest is one of the most powerful tools for increasing links back to your website, thus driving more traffic. Research indicates that Pinterest is more effective to drive traffic back to a website compared to other social media sites, even Facebook.

How Can I Trust RankON?
  1. Highly experienced Pinterest marketers
  2. Optimize your Pinterest profile
  3. Optimize the already existing pins
  4. Keep your Pinterest account updated
  5. Optimize Pinboards
What Details I have To provide?

When you contract with us for your Pinterest Marketing needs, then you have to give the following details to us:

  1. Pinterest Account Access
  2. Google Analytics Details
  3. Google Tag Manager
